title: UAE urgently recalls 4 health products: What every consumer must know
summary_full: UAE health authorities have urgently recalled four products, including three supplements and one medical item, due to serious safety concerns like unapproved ingredients and contamination. Consumers are warned against purchasing or using these. The recall of the supplements and health product highlights the nation's commitment to public health and strict regulatory enforcement.
